comments.comment: Thopila mechchara kaalaya Basmathi dha keewea? Ane buuruwo Gotabaya janaadhipathi mejik kaarayek nove mewa aka retentions karanna. Gotabaya janapathi ta lebune duushitha ratak. Hitapu UNP horu karalathiyenadewal danne neddha. A samaga gang wathura. Mea dewal kramayen visadaavi. Athumata tikak dawas yae. Thopila dushta jaathiyak. Rata lassanata patan gannakota akul helana thierisan jaathiyak. Thopila hemadaama andure akae. Dan samaharunta kutti kadaganna berokotath vedanaawae. Ethin hondha bauddha hondha jaathiyak nam poddak iwasapalla. Thopila anunta gotta allanne nethiwa. Penenawa nedha Dath dostharage keruwawa. Oyawage thawa godak innawa. Unwa suddha karanna thiyanawa. Umbalaa ewaseema danne nethina pansalakata gihilla banak dahamak ahapalla. Thopila yahapathata akul helana sangamayakdha. Hondha karanna egenaganilla. Umbalaage daru pavul darmaya visin diunukarana heti peneavi, meya aka maasayak karala balapalla.berina wahakaala meriyalla anunta akul helanne nethiwa.
comments.author: Rita De Silva
